insights.title: A better understanding of your heart disorder
insights.description: By monitoring the heart disorder, you and your doctor gain more insights into how it evolves.

lifestyle.title: Live according to a healthy lifestyle
lifestyle.description: Discover how tips on sleep, balanced nutrition, and stress contribute to a healthy lifestyle for your heart.

enjoy.title: Worry less, enjoy more
enjoy.description: It's important for us that you can focus on the beautiful things life has to offer.

landing.title: Don't let your heart disorder take the upper hand.
landing.description: Take the first step and start a diary about your heart disorder today.
landing.agreement: By continuing, you agree to our

daysSince.null: No days with an irregular heartbeat

cta.title: Add a heartmoment
cta.subtitle: Always make a new moment when having an irregular heartbeat.

episodes.title: My heartmoments
episodes.description: Keep track of your moments and get more insight in your heart rhythm.

discover.title: Pursuing a healthy heart
discover.description: Be aware of the things that are giving your heart a hard time.

start.title: Share your health story with us
start.description: We aim to gain more insights into your heart disorder with your medical data.

heartDisease.question: Which heart disorder do you have?

frequency.question: How often do you have an irregular heartbeat?

duration.question: How long do these moments last?

riskfactors.question: Which of the following risk factors are applicable to you?

emptyState.title: A perfect month!
emptyState.description: You didn't have any irregular heartbeats this month. Keep up the good work.

measure.question: Measure your heartbeat
measure.description: Place two finger of your right hand on your left wrist and measure your heartbeat for 1 minute.

pulse.question: Which pulse did you measure?
pulse.description: You can measure your pulse by using your smartwatch, or by placing two fingers on your wrist.

start.question: When did your irregular heartbeat start?

end.question: When did your heartbeat became regular again?

activity.question: What were you doing when your heartbeat became irregular?

symptoms.question: Select all symptoms that you experienced

notes.question: Write something down about this heartmoment

confirmation.title: Heartmoment registered!
confirmation.description: The hearmoment has been added to your diary. You can view and change it at any time.

cancel.title: Quit heartmoment?
cancel.description: By quiting this heartmoment, you will lose all the data you have entered so far.

start.title: Register a new heartmoment
start.description: The next couple of questions will help you collect some experiences and feelings you had during your heartmoment.

info.title: Some things to keep in mind when creating a heartmoment

safety.title: Safety first
safety.description: Always make sure you are in a safe environment when having an irregular heartbeat. If you are not, make sure you get to a safe place first.

help.title: Help is always nearby
help.description: If you are in a safe place, make sure you have someone nearby who can help you if needed.

doctor.title: Contact your doctor
doctor.description: If your irregular heartbeat gets out of hand, make sure you contact 112 or visit the nearest hospital.

pulse.title: Where you able to measure your heartbeat?
pulse.description: You can measure your pulse by using your smartwatch, or by placing two fingers on your wrist.

confirmation.title: Delete this heartmoment?
confirmation.description: By deleting this heartmoment, you will lose all the data you have entered so far. This action cannot be undone.

pulse.title: Pulse
pulse.description: Your heart rate is determined manually or by a medical device.

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: You were doing the following activity just before your heartmoment.

symptoms.title: Symptoms
symptoms.description: During your heartmoment, you experienced the following symptoms in mild or severe form.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Some notes you didn't want to forget about your heartmoment.

cta.title: Do you want to delete your account?
cta.description: By deleting your account, you will lose all your data and you will no longer be able to use the app.

language.title: Changing the language of the app
language.description: Follow the next steps to change your language preferences.

description.ios: You can add a new language or rearrange the order of languages to set a new default language. The language displayed first will be automatically set as your default language.
description.android: You can add a new language or rearrange the order of languages to set a new default language. The language displayed first will be automatically set as your default language. Don't forget to save your changes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our app.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.description: We collect personal information provided during account registration, including your name, email address, and password. Additionally, we also collect medical profile information, such as your year of birth, heart condition, gender, risk factors that increase the risk of heart condition, average duration of an attack, and the frequency of your attacks.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.description: We use your personal information to provide and improve our app services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

storage.title: Data Retention
storage.description: We will retain your personal information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. If your account is deleted, all associated data will also be removed.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We may use third-party services to enhance app functionality. These services are governed by their own privacy policies.

changes.title: User Choices
changes.description: You can view, update, or delete your personal information within the app's settings. If this is not possible, you can always contact us using the contact details provided at the bottom of this Privacy Policy.

updates.title: Updates to the Privacy Policy
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using our app, you agree to be bound by these User Terms, our Privacy Policy, and any other guidelines or rules applicable to specific services we may provide.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process. It is your responsibility to keep your account information up-to-date.

medicalInformation.title: Medical Information
medicalInformation.description: You understand and consent to providing your medical profile information for the purpose of enhancing your user experience within the app.

security.title: Security
security.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. If you suspect unauthorized access to your account, please notify us immediately.

prohibitedConduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibitedConduct.description: You shall not use the app for any illegal, abusive, or unauthorized purpose.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content and materials within the app are protected by intellectual property rights and are owned or licensed by us.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The app provides information for educational purposes only and should not be considered medical advice. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical concerns.

changes.title: Changes to User Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these User Terms at any time. Your continued use of the app after such modifications will constitute your agreement to the updated terms.

password.length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
